about_the_game:
Listen to The Lord of the Rings: Gollum™ soundtrack at any time with this dedicated application. Embark on a musical adventure in Middle-earth with an epic orchestral composition, remixed as a 17-track album.

Gollum soundtrack credits:
Music by Broome Stella Music Collective
Executive music producer: Milan Meyer Kaya
Music producer: Andi Meid
Composer: Jun Broome
Strings and orchestration: Peter Imig
Flutes and clarinets: Edgar Herzog
Cello: Friedrich Paravicini
Percussion: Stephan Krause / Elbtonal Percussion
Vocals: Geka Winkler
Mixing and recording @ High Air East Studios by Milan Meyer-Kaya, Andi Meid and Peter Imig
Mastering: Andi Meid
